code: import{useSelector}from"react-redux";export var useFormatWithUserBooks=function useFormatWithUserBooks(book){var userBooks=useSelector(function(state){return state.library.userBooks;});if(userBooks&&userBooks.length>0){for(var i=0;i<userBooks.length;i++){if(book.title===userBooks[i].title&&book.author===userBooks[i].author){book.booklists=userBooks[i].booklists;book.user_rating=userBooks[i].user_rating;book.user_review=userBooks[i].user_review||null;book.reviews=userBooks[i].reviews||[];return book;}}}return book;};export var useFormatWithBooklists=function useFormatWithBooklists(booksArray){var booklistNames=[];booksArray.forEach(function(book){if(book.booklists){book.booklists.forEach(function(name){if(!booklistNames.includes(name)&&name!=="reviewed"){booklistNames.push(name);}});}});var booklistObjArray=booklistNames.map(function(booklistName){return{booklist_name:booklistName,books:booksArray.filter(function(book){return book.booklists.includes(booklistName);})};});return booklistObjArray;};
